Question: KAHE CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
KAHE

Multi-Purpose Electric Outboard Motor

- Portable outboard motor, underwater scooter, and propulsion device
- Electric, one-piece compact unit (4.5 kg)
- Propels up to 600 kg boat at 5 knots
- 3 forward speeds, reverse
- Enclosed 420 Wh battery, 1 hr boat propulsion, 6 hrs kayak propulsion
- Quiet, odorless, no carbon emissions
- Available for preorder at $1,007
- Expected delivery in May 2024
- Mounting accessories sold separately
